reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater's appearance disappointing, saying it looks nothing like the product pictures or description. Moreover, the material quality receives criticism, with one customer noting it feels like plastic nylon, while another mentions the yarn is scratchy. Additionally, the sweater runs small, is not thick as advertised, and has poor sizing, with one customer noting the button holes are flimsy.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Deceptive images, nothing like the pictured product! Save your money!
items.body: This is a definite do NOT buy. It is obvious that the company used photos from another site because this sweater is nothing like the photos. Not even the color. It is a very lightweight, scratchy, acrylic yarn blend. There is NO cotton anywhere in or on the sweater. It is exceptionally small. I don't think a 2XL would fit my friend who is a small/medium! The button holes were all stretched out so the placket that they were in was also stretched out. Meaning it would never line up properly. There are threads everywhere and they don't even match the sweater! There were white threads sticking out all along the hood area meaning it was sewn on not knitted on. There were also yarn ends hanging off everywhere. It would be easy to fix IF the sweater was worth the effort. It is very, very lightweight. There is no way you could stay warm in it. Absolutely nothing like the picture. It wasn't chunky and it certainly didn't have any ribbing anywhere on it! This is a very deceptive sweater listing. DO NOT BUY!!! Update: You get a mailing label but you have to find a shipper and pay all return costs. If this hadn't cost so much I wouldn't even bother. Read more
items.author: Dragonlady of VT

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
items.body: Not what I expected. The sweater is not soft, thick, or fluffy like it looks in the picture. My biggest concern is that the button holes are flimsy and not stitched to prevent them from ripping up when you button up the sweater. So I'm not at all satisfied with the quality of this sweater. It's a shame, it's a Christmas gift to myself. Read more
items.author: Sandra L. Adams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars cozy sweater
items.author: iphone charger didn’t last past 6 months

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor Review
items.body: The quality is poor, the yarn used to make this is scratchy. It feels like burlap to the skin. Also the button holes were unfinished. I also have not received the label needed to return this product in the fashion the company requested. Read more
items.author: Nancy Kyser

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as described!!
items.body: Awful material felt like plastic nylon, Ill fitting, not cozy at all, did NOT look like described Returns have to be approved via email, definitely not cable knit, definitely not thick. Read more
items.author: Anaya Dagny

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sweater Jacket
items.body: The sweater was pretty but runs small and it did not look exactly like the picture showed The picture made it look thicker Read more
items.author: BJ

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money!
items.body: Don't waste your money on this item it is NOT what is advertised! It's not cable knit its thin and very poorly made! ! Read more
items.author: kathy justice

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth buying very disappointed
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Not a chunky, not fleece but very thin doesn't even look like the picture and they want me to pay to ship it back. I ordered 2 as gifts. Read more
items.author: Sally Grimes

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Khaki, Blue, Yellow, Black, Orange, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
